briefTitle: Study of Efficacy and Safety of 300 IR Sublingual Immunotherapy (SLIT) Tablets in Adult Patients With Allergic Grass Pollen Rhinoconjunctivitis
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Multi-center, Phase III Study of the Efficacy and Safety of 300 IR Sublingual Immunotherapy (SLIT) Administered as Allergen-based Tablets Once Daily to Adult Patients Suffering From Grass Pollen Rhinoconjunctivitis
conditions: Allergic Rhinitis Due to Grass Pollens
summary: The purpose of the study is to assess the efficacy and safety of 300 IR sublingual tablet of grass pollen allergen extract compared to placebo in adult patient with allergic rhinoconjunctivitis.
